services.title: Technical Guidance
services.details: Technical guidance on increasing the yield of various crops like Cotton, Soybean, Chana, as well as vegetables like Tomato, Brinjal, Red-Green Chillies, Spinach, Curry Leaves, Onion, Coriander, and fruits like Mango, Watermelon, Muskmelon, Orange, Citrus, Chikoo, Custard Apple.

services.title: Krishi Seva Kendra
services.details: Krishi seva kendra at Taluka umri district nanded Maharashtra. For providing needed Fertlizers/seeds/Insecticides/Micronutrients and farm equipments.

services.title: Goverment Procurement Center
services.details: Government Procurement Center by NAFED at taluka Umri District Nanded Maharashtra for MSP procurement by the central government.

services.title: On Field Assistance
services.details: On field assistance by technical agriculturist of our FPC for farmers problems with solution.
